title: Basket Bros Unblocked
description:
Basket Bros is a free basketball sports game. Welcome to the wild world of internet sports where you can invite your friends for a one on one beat down on the court. Thrill to the squeak of the sneaks and the swish of the net as you dribble, dodge, pivot, and shoot your way to victory in this careful re-creation of basketball. You can play online, against the computer, or even invite your friends for a proper beatdown. It is a real rocking good time where you will prove your worth and test your mettle in the only court that matters, the court of basketball. So, get ready to Soar through the air and dunk all over the place in this frenzied basketball game!

BasketBros.io is a side-scrolling game where you hoop vs great opponents. Pick the high flying Zane Willow and soar for dunks, or choose Steph Flurry and his deadly 3 point arsenal!

### PVP MULTIPLAYER

Invite a friend to compete on the court! Prove once and for all who's the true DunkMaster!

TOTALLY UNREALISTIC GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY
Who wants to be constrained by reality anyway? Do you want to jump two feet off the ground? Or would you rather SKY for a MASSIVE JAM!

CHOOSE FROM A VARIETY OF CHARACTERS
Each character in BasketBros.io has his own unique abilities. As you WIN, you get to UNLOCK MORE BROS for even more slam jamming FUN! Can you unlock them all? Can you WIN with them all?
instructions:
CONTROLS
WASD or Arrows to move, Space Bar to shoot
